page.title: 05Upottery's Farm Livestock 2
page.content:
{ Cattle Some times the cow gets milk fever.Milk fever is when the cow can't get up.You sometimes ring the vet He will come and put some liquid in to the cow by a needle.In about five hours the cow should get up. {Sheep and lambs
When you have some sheep and one is ready to lamb you bring in two,to keep the one thats ready to lamb company. When it has lambed you can give the sheep some water and eventually the lamb will be sucking milk from his mothers udder,and that is what makes the lamb grow stronger.Then you can sell it for money or breed from it.
